version.hint: Please select the period where your game version falls in.
version.label: Game version

resource.hint: Please select add-on modules you need.
resource.label: Add-on modules

list.hint: Please select Mods to be included.
list.label: Mods

beExtType.hint: Please select the file format you prefer for the pack.
beExtType.label: File format

compatible.hint: Make the pack compatible with language files in other packs. This option will overwrite Memified Chinese onto Simplified Chinese, thus you only need to select "Simplified Chinese" in the language menu. Learn more at README.md.
compatible.label: Compatible option
compatible.disabled: You are playing game version older than 1.13, thus this is forced to set to on.

collections.hint: Please select Add-on module collections, cherry-picked by our team.
collections.label: Module collections

child.label: Child Mode
hints: For children with immature mentality. Extra protected and censored. Recommended for streaming and recording.
For teenagers. Only political and especially suggestive contents are censored. Suitable for streaming and recording.
For fully grown adult minds. NO censoring at all. We DO NOT recommended this for streaming and recording.
Don't know how to choose those options? Just click the button below.
If you need the links to MCBBS/GitHub/Disc pack for Bedrock, you can click the Bedrock tab before clicking the buttons.
You can report issues to us by clicking the ¬ø on the right corner.
We are switching to a new build server. If you find a problem, you can switch the server in the appbar and create an issue.
Memified Chinese is an active project. Please check back often.

bedrock_hint.text: We assume that you are using the latest Minecraft version. Read more at {0} in the GitHub repo.

fetchListFailed.headline: Error
fetchListFailed.text: An error occurred while requesting module list to the server.

help.title: Help & About
help.thinkTwice: Think twice before submitting any issues!

thinkList.1: Have you read the hints below every option?
thinkList.2: Have you read the hints above the download button?
thinkList.3: Have you tried to troubleshoot your game and Mods?

help.sure: If you are sure that Memified Chinese have problems, you can report them to us. Suggestions are welcomed too!

needToKnowList.1: According to the license, the developers don't have to address every single issue.
needToKnowList.2: Please make sure that your issues haven't been submitted by someone else.
needToKnowList.3: Please use Mandarin Chinese or English.
needToKnowList.4: Too many spam issues may cause you to be banned.
needToKnowList.5: Submit issues in the accordingly project. Especially, do not submit in-game content or problem to "Web Builder", it is only for failed builds or problems with the web interface.
